name: @lazy-init/plugin-swc-v81
description: SWC plugin for use with lazy-init.
author: Reiss Davidson

scripts.build: cargo build -p swc_plugin_lazy_init --release --no-default-features --features use-plugin_transform --target wasm32-wasi && shx cp ../../target/wasm32-wasi/release/swc_plugin_lazy_init.wasm package.json LICENSE dist
